name: Work In Progress (Touji)
description:
[Work.In.Progress] A short game featuring Yuzuki Yukari with Kasane Teto and others.

You're in charge of a factory. Your goal is to reach maximum worker capacity.

Start up the factory! Run the farm and feed the workers!

WSAD to move.

Enter/Space/Z to interact.

Esc/X for menu.

I decided doing my own 48 hour game-making challenge. It took about twice as long to finish this because certain animations and features took a lot of effort to get right. I even ended up creating a prototype farming plugin. I should probably do this a few more times as learning tools on the road to the One Big Game.

This game also has a lot of Teto and at some point I realized I could actually voice her because I already have the free UTAU software!
